product-research.title: product Ã— research
product-research.promise: prove your product meets accessibility and learning standardsâ€”before you ship.
product-research.quadrantStory: you're in the product Ã— research quadrantâ€”where user experience meets rigorous validation. this is where we make sure your products and experiences actually works for the people it's meant to serve.
product-research.story: we start with a heuristic reviewâ€”our team looks at your product or experience through established usability and access lenses.  then we recruit real users for moderated testing sessions, working alongside them as they move through realistic task and share what's helping or getting in the way. . we agree with the participants how to capture their experiences, missing numbers and stories, notes, visuals and recordings, so what we gather is authentic and meaningful.  the analysis identifies patterns across experiences  and prioritises issues by impact and feasibility. you receive a findings report with specific, actionable recommendations and examples of what particpants found easy, hard or valuable.
product-research.crossover: validation isn't the end of the storyâ€”it's the beginning of better design. our research always points toward solutions, not just problems. we work closely with your design and dev teams to translate findings into improvements that ship.

outcomes.title: access and inclusion snapshot
outcomes.detail: a structured view of who your product or experience currently works well for, and who it quietly leaves out, with clear ratings across key steps of the journey and a focussed set of viable changes that take into account your real constraints.

outcomes.title: usability issues mapped
outcomes.detail: a prioritised list of friction points, dead ends, and confusionâ€”categorised by severity and linked to specific user sessions.

outcomes.detail: a clear, visual summary that communicates findings to leadership, with recommended fixes and estimated impact.
